TimelineContent.heroTitle: Ndi umwandisi watoranijwe mu Cyongereza kandi ntambara mu Marikani / Ubwongereza / Iburokili muri AirBnb's. Ndi munyamusezerano mu crypto, inzira y'ibikorwa n'iterambere ry'imiterere y'ikoranabuhoro. Ndi umuntu wacitse ubwenge mu mahoro y'amafaranga n'ubushakashatsi.
TimelineContent.timeline2025Description: Mu mwaka unu nakurikiye igihe cyo kwambuka [mainnet ya LiquidOps](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1905268807746060790?s=20). Imwe mu myifuzo myinshi nzamenyeshwa mu mwaka umu niyuko ibikorwa by'umuntu mushya sibicirirwa n'ibyakozwe gusa. Kubwanya n'ubushakashatsi ni ibiribwa byinshi (cyangwa neza) kubw'ibyakozwe, nonaha natangiye [gukora ibirango](/projects#content-creator) nukunyuranisha ubwenge.
TimelineContent.timeline2024Description: Nabanje gutekereza igitekerezo [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops) n'[Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer) mwaka wa none urugo rw'imvura mu Cambridge aho ndiheraga. [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) yari ihitamo ntambwe kandi tubwire vuba inzira y'gukoresha ibitang'i byoburyohe bwo mu gihugu. Nkurikije nabaye Engineering Partner kuri [AO Ventures](https://aoventures.io). Nabafatanyije inzira n'abantu ba mukurambiyamafaranga muri cohort hanyuma nabonye niba bari bahitamo kugira demo day kuva aho imiterere y'imashini. Ku murongo w'ibyo, nkindi nabigire hamwe n'igitekerezo cyanjye - [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops).
TimelineContent.timeline2023Description: Nari umuntu wa mbere wazamucira muri [Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) nyuma y'uko baceceretse amafaranga. Nagurizanya inzira y'[Wallety](/projects#wallety) kugira ngo ndi mumuryohe mu gitondo [Arweave](https://arweave.org). Mugihe cy'uko nari ndazo, nabateje [Othent](/projects#othent), Oases hamwe n'[Subsidise.js](/projects#subsidisejs).
TimelineContent.timeline2022Title: Ninjira mu Community Labs & niga nzira y'imiterere y'ikoranabuhoro
TimelineContent.timeline2022Description: Nyuma yo kumva ko gusubiranamo atahinduza nkuko kubaka bigira inzira, nzamutse nka mukurikiro wo kwiga kumurika uherezo. Mwakiriye kubara iyo ndego yo kwiga kumurika vuba kandi nabubatije igikoresho cya mbere [Wallety](/projects#wallety). Byari biguye ariko byari bifasha cyane. Hanyuma [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) yamaze kumva neza kandi ahaguruka inshuti nziza kandi nabyemerera kumukinira i [Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) nka Fellow yambere yaborwa.
TimelineContent.timeline2021Title: Ninjira mu guhuza inzira y'amafaranga kuri crypto kuva mumo ejya nyumba yanjye
TimelineContent.timeline2021Description: Nabajeje umwanya wo kurongera utaratanzwe mu gitondo cy'imafara y'inzira kuva mu mwaka w'ibanjirije nk'imbere. Nabakora umwanya 3 atapfuye mbere y'uko banitanze umwanya w'amafaranga, nanyuma nabakora inzira y'amafaranga yabo n'amafara y'ibintu byinshi mu mwaka uzajya. Nakoze ibihe byanjye inguzanyo mu biho byinshi, gusomeka ibiwamwete mu mirongo y'inzira n'abaningi bakaba amateka n'abanditi. Muri uyu mwaka ndetse nabaka [Polkadot Ambassador](https://polkadot.com/community/ambassador-program) arahabanya guhoza umuntu n'abandi, nakazwa ibyo batoteza mu mahoro nayo arahabanya ihome rimwe na London picnic aho abantu magana y'umuntu na hejuru barinze, harimo abahuza inzira n'amateka.
TimelineContent.timeline2020Title: Crypto Teen & kweguruka icyigisha cy'isusumamimu cyubukungu
TimelineContent.timeline2020Description: Mugihe cy'uko ndirangira icyigisha cy'isusumamimu [Emil Dale Academy](https://www.emildale.co.uk), nabateje TikTok y'igufu ry'ubwiyunge kugira ngo itegure Gen Z kuri crypto. Muburyo bwo kuruka mu mahoro, nasubiza go ku basimukamimu batanu igicumi n'ibintu, amafaranga n'inzira mugendu niba bazandikira nkaho nitunzira. Kuva ku mimu itanu igicumi, umwe gusa cyangwa itandatu batinabyakuza. Nabakozaga mirongo y'umuntu. Zoom mu kwigunane k'icyigisha n'inzira y'umuntu wanjye wa mugezi wari akaba inzira y'ibaruwa ariyo hanyuma nakagatire icyigisha kugira ngo ndetse icyogezi n'abahindekanyi b'amafaranga. Nari mugihe gitandukanye gikomeye mu nzira yanjye kandi gakagarire cyane kuva kugihe cyo. Muri uyu mwaka ndetse nabatsimbitse inzira y'ibiryo ryanjye kurangira icyigisha cy'isusumamimu kuva mu gusobanura ibiryo by'abantu basomvye kuri eBay kugira ngo nitanze amafaranga y'icyigisha nyuma y'uko nabone imyumvuko kuva kuri Gary Vee, yashyiguriye!
TimelineContent.timeline2019Description: Ninjira mu gihugu cy'Ethereum mu 2019 nyuma y'uko namenyekanye akwaito y'amafaranga y'ikigo.
TimelineContent.timeline2017Description: Mugihe cy'uko abandi bakaba bakuza amata, nari nkurangira amakanya y'iconi.
TimelineContent.timeline2026Description: Mu mwaka uyu LiquidOps yatakiye Astro (https://www.astriousd.com/), yubatswaga n'inshuti zanjye nziza Kadar Sayed Abdi (https://x.com/0xKadar).
TimelineContent.photo2026_3: Visa yanjye ya US O1 yemejwe!

AngelPage.title: Icyogezi cy'Umwana
introAndElevator: Niyubwiyunge gusobanukirako abanditi bashaka kubaka ikintu bakuza n'ubwiyunge. Mugihe cy'uko nreba inzira n'inzira nzishobora gufatabuza hanze y'amafaranga, niyubwiyunge kubaka mu kutangira.

Nubwa ubwiyunge nkubitanya [amafaranga atanu igicumi n'ibintu] mu nzira y'mbere y'ikibazo kandi mu nzira y'imbere. Nta kibazo niba nta bitanya, nimpaka gukora ifatizo. Uretse abyo, amafaranga n'ubwiyunge, nimpaka gufatabuza mu mahoro y'ubwiyunge, imihigo ya porogaramu, ubwiyunge bw'inyuma, cyangwa kugira nk'umuntu wo kwitabira ibibazo, bona ibisobanuro byinshi [ibya mahali](#).

Ibyasigaye, ndi muntu watize igitekerezo kandi nimpaka kubaho nkw'icyo gitondo kigera kugihe cyose, ntago nari nimpaka kubata imbaraga z'inzira mu gitondo. Nubwa ubwiyunge nkubitanya inzira mu mahoro nuburyo bw'inyuma cyangwa bwari nabatije, nibyo shobora kubufatabuza nubwiyunge. Soma ibisobanuro byinshi [ibyasigaye](‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã/disclosures).
AngelPage.helpTitle: Ibyingenzi byakozwe nabikinyarwanda nabikora kugira umuntu
helpItems: Ntago nari nimpaka gufatabuza ubwiyunge bw'ubutaka, nta shoka, ntago nimpaka kubaha inzira zijya ku bantu benshi (abahanuzi, abasigaye, kandi abantu benshi) na kwiyunga kugira ngo ntago nimpaka gufunguza imigenzuro y'amafaranga menshi. Mugihe cyo, nabatije inzira 4 mu Ubwongereza kandi 1 Delaware C corporation.
Nabiga nkwigisha imiterere y'ikoranabuhoro kuva inyuma y'ibihitamo
Nabakore inzira z'abandi benshi zishobora gukora vuba
Nabaye muri ubwiyunge bwinshi mugihe cy'amafaranga VC, accelerators, grant foundations, hamwe na decentralised blockchain treasuries
Nabaye muri ubwiyunge bwinshi mugihe cy'amafaranga VC, accelerators, grant foundations
Ndimunyuma y'inzira/VCs/corporates kandi nari muntu w'abandi benshi, harimo CEO, engineer, analyst, COO responsibilities kandi nari private software contractor
Nk'uko shobora gusobanukirako kuva ku iye website, ndi SCRAPPY. Niyo nzira nyinshi nanjye kandi nimpaka kubafatabuza nubwiyunge niyubuzirikane.
Nabatanije waitlist yari namwe natanga z'inzira kandi nkakura kuri $55m mu mahoro y'amafaranga
Nabatije/nagize/nabatangije porogaramu nyinshi muburyo bwa startup kandi mu muntu wanjye
Nabatije pitch decks, pitches, kandi business plans wuburyohe kandi ntaguburyohe
AngelPage.pressureTitle: Nkufatabuza Ibibazo Munsi y'Ubwiyunge kandi Nbikemeza
pressureItems: Nagusobanura ibyego 2 birinigira muburyo bw'imashini irinigira DeFi protocol
Nabigire imbere y'abantu benshi kandi nabigire nka TOTALLY fluffed speeches
Nabigire IP, nabigire IP, hamwe na kuguhuza inzira y'ibikorwa
Nabatije inzira kandi nabigire kandi nabigiye inzira
Nabakore akwaito, abahanuzi, freelancers, kandi marketing firms
Ku mimu y'inzira y'amafaranga (ibi gusibye nimpaka gufunga intro)
Nari nimpaka gufunguza inzira nkw'ibibazo byinshi, cyane cyane n'abahindekanyi benshi
Nari nimpaka gutanga 1-1 negative feedback kandi ndetse nabigiye inzira yinshi
Nari nk'umuntu wazavira mu mahoro y'amafaranga
Nagusubira kandi nakamatanya ubwiyunge bw'umuntu n'abandi batize ibibazo
Nabakore mu mahoro meza, nabakore mu mahoro mabi, nabatije meza, kandi nabasha mahoro yanjye inzira yinshi
Muburyo bwa kera nari actor. Nimpaka kubafatabuza nk'umuntu mu mahoro y'ibihitamo kandi demo day pitches
Nabigire VC pitches irikomeye kandi rikomeye kandi rikomeye cyane
Nabigire kandi habigiye hackathons (ntago nabigiye rimwe, loser)
Ndi muntu wazi kumenya porogaramu kandi kazi kuri tools nka Figma kandi Webflow
AngelPage.mistakesTitle: Ibibazo Birinigira Nabigiye Ntago Nimpaka Gubikarira
mistakesItems: Natanze ibitaro by'igihe cyo kumarika $50k USD mu mahoro y'amafaranga yo gutangiza ikintu cyakwigize $5k
Natanze $75k USD kugirango nkore indelesi kuri ikintu kidashyize mu masoko
Natashye umwaka mugihe cyo kubyubaka n'ibyo gitarimo gukenera kuzamura no gutangazacyuho
Nabaye na kuri subiki ry'imibare ikintu cyacinyuje amafaranga yose y'ubwubake bwanjye n'akaturuza muri -$60k n'ukuri ndoguranye
Nambaje icyiciro cy'amafaranga yanjye n'amafaranga y'abandi n'akaturuza akakuri, icyo nakomereza
Nabaye imbere, ntagisubire gucysobanukiranye n'ingano y'amafaranga
Nawubushe amafaranga akabije kuri bayireyubwiriyeyo kubyika mumagambo yabyo bibakeneraga
Nabyubakaga mu mitekerereze yanjye kandi nabikarubanya
AngelPage.astroDescription: Astro iroroshya ubwiyunge bw'imashini nk'umuntu wafungira stablecoin.
AngelPage.velaventuresDescription: Web3 venture studio inyuma y'ikintu nka [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com), [Vento](https://ventoswap.com/?tab=swap) kandi [AO Sync](https://github.com/vela-ventures/ao-sync-sdk).
AngelPage.upshotDescription: Inzira y'mbere y'isi y'ibyo bitakira prediction card platform, yakozwe muburyo bwa Base ecosystem.
AngelPage.saySoDescription: Isoko ry'ubuhanga bw'itsinda ritakira muburyo bwa Web3 yubatswe mu nkengero ya Sei blockchain.
AngelPage.plasmaOrbitalDescription: Isosiyete y'ubwenge bw'imashini y'ururangira rw'amakara ahanamigabanya inzira z'igihe cye.

content.content: Iri peji ribamo amakuru y'inzira-nzira ingumbi z'ibidukiro by'amafaranga. Nyuruyemo akamaro kariya makuru mbere yuko ukurikiranya mu mahoro y'amafaranga.
Amafaranga y'ubwanjye gusa

Ndibara amafaranga yanjye. Siyo **hafi** y'ifundi y'amashanyalaze, **ntago** ngenzi ifundi, kandi **sintera** amafaranga ku ba Limited Partners (LPs) cyangwa abandi bantu bavuga amafaranga. Ibyo bisobanuro by'ibidukiro byose bisabwa nanjye gusa kugira amafaranga yanjye.
Ntabwo ni igi ki cyigishwa ku bidukiro

Ikintu cyose kuri iyi sitiye **ntibyasobanukirwa** nka bisobanuro by'ibidukiro, inyongera, konti, imibare, cyangwa igi ki cyigishwa. Siyo **n'atari** kwemezwa cyangwa gufatanyije na Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) cyangwa indi nzira y'igenga ibidukiro. Ibyo bisobanuro by'ibidukiro byawe nabwo bwacu byifuzwa.
Nta bwumvikane bw'inzira-nzira
Ntabwo ndoze ku birema cyangwa ku binzira by'ibidukiro bya ibyo bidukiro keretse uko bivugwa mu ngen za bidukiro. Ndi muntu wibara, ntabwo ndi mugenzi, umutwe, cyangwa umuntu w'imvikane.
Ntabwo ari ikarito

Ikintu cyose kuri iyi sitiye **sibigera** nka karito, igishwa, cyangwa ishimwe y'ibidukiro mu ikintu cyose, subiki cyose, cyangwa ikintu cy'ibidukiro. Ibyo bisobanuro by'ibyo bisobanuro byanjye nibyo gusa.
Nta bwumvikane bw'ibidukiro
Kurikiranya nkwandike imvugo yacu **ntibyasobanura** ko ndibara. Nkora ibyo bisobanuro icyumweru cy'ubwiyunge kandi ndibara hafi 1-2 tu gusa mu mwaka.
Gukuramo neza

Ndi u munini w'ikintu mu gihe cyose nka mbere, kandi ndashakira kubera umwaka w'ejo hazaza, nta nyungu y'ikinyamakuru cy'ibyo bisobanuro. Nandemeza gusa mu binzira bisobanura nk'iyo ndibara cyangwa ndibaru mu murongo, nta yo nkwigira neza.
Nta mpizimviriza

Sipiza ibyo bisobanuro cyangwa ibyo bidukiro. Nabyi nti ibyo bisobanuro ntibyizere (keretse ibyo bidukiro by'inyuma) ‚Äî [Wubirebure Steve Jobs yo kubitangaza](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-c4CNB80SRc). Ndi gusa mu mahoro y'amafaranga mu bintu n'imvugo z'ibyo bidukiro niyo ndashakira n'ibyo nzi ko nbigira nyungu.
Agaciro k'igitangaza

Nta yo ndizera ko ndibara nyungu mu bintu bya hejuru. Ndi mu bintu bya ibigo kandi nkwigira neza ibyo bisobanuro by'imbere (mbere y'uguhe A). Ariko niba ari umugenzi wa hejuru kandi wibaza ko ndibara nyungu, ndi ku mato.
Igenga imibare
Ibyo bisobanuro by'imibare (nka SEIS cyangwa EIS) biguha neza no ku mategeko ya HMRC. Ugomba gusubiza umuntu w'imibare. Ntabwo ndoze ku birema by'imibare by'ibyo bidukiro.
Ukwiherekeza

Niba ushira amakuru y'ukwiherekeza, ndibikora n'imvikane, ariko ntabwo nkwigira ko ari ukwiherekeza. Nkwigira neza ibyo bisobanuro bya bintu by'ubwanjye. Ntacakubwira amakuru utakwishyira. Keretse nandike ikintu cy'ukwiherekeza n'iwe, ntabwo ndoze mu mahoro y'ukwiherekeza.
Ibyo bisobanuro by'ibyo bisobanuro
Ndibara mu binzira bibikora mu nzira itandukanye cyangwa mu bintu byawe. Ntabwo ndoze gushira abandi mu mahoro yanjye, kandi ntabwo ndoze kubakira ibyo bisobanuro by'ibyo bisobanuro.
Akashya k'agaciro

**Ibyo bisobanuro by'amafaranga mu bintu bidafungurwa bivugwa nkibyo bivugwa n'agaciro karako.** Ushobora gukuramo amafaranga yose. Ibyo bisobanuro by'ejo hazaza sibigera kubitangaza. Agaciro k'ibidukiro gashobora kugwa n'kurengera. Ibyo bisobanuro by'ibigo bidafungurwa ntibigasimbuza amafaranga maze uhora ari iwe w'ibyo bisobanuro.

content.title: Umwanya w'umuntu w'u Bwongereza
content.content: Ndi **Umuntu wiyoba arashishoza** mu nzira ya Financial Services and Markets Act 2000 (Financial Promotion) Order 2005. Niyoba arashishoza ku bwa ko nahindutse mu rwego rw'ishuri mu ntara ya ibidukiro ku bintu bidafungurwa mu myaka ibiri ishize (nk'umuntu wihembe mu mahoro y'ibyo bisobanuro bya blockchain bivugwa ibyo bisobanuro by'ibigo bidafungurwa).
content.note: **Kuri abagereka:** Mu kuva amakuru y'ibidukiro, wiyoba wasubize ko wagize nzira z'ubwongereza kandi wiyoba arashishoza ko ndi umuntu wiyoba arashishoza. Niba ushaka ko ndandike ikintu cy'ubwongereza mbere yuko ushira imvugo yacu, ndi kumirire.

content.content: Niba ufite ibibazo ku makuru yubwanjye, kurikirana nanjye kuri heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Kwemeza ibyo mategeko
Mu kugera kuri lorimerjenkins.com ("Sitiye"), wiyoba wakoze nk'amwe n'ibyo mategeko y'ibikorerezi ("Mategeko"). Niba ntiyemeza ibyo mategeko, ntacakoresha Sitiye.
Igisobanuro cy'ibikorerezi
Lorimerjenkins.com ni sitiye y'ubwanjye ikorerwa n'Lorimer Jenkins. Sitiye ishyira amakuru ku bisobanuro byanjye, ibyo bisobanuro, ibyo bisobanuro by'amafaranga, n'ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwanjye.
Gukoresha Sitiye
Gukoresha neza
Wiyoba wakoze nk'amwe nkigukoresha Sitiye gusa mu nzira z'ubwubake kandi ntacakora ibyo bisobanuro by'abandi cyangwa kubazwa neza. Ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwubake bikubiyemo:

items: Kugerageza gukomereza Sitiye cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro byayo
Gushyira inzira y'ibyo bisobanuro, ibyo bisobanuro cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwubake
Gukoresha ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwubake (robots, scrapers) ntacakemeza
Kutera inzira, kurwanya, cyangwa gufata amakuru y'abandi

content.content: Gukomereza Sitiye
Ndi hamwe n'uko ndibara uko nkoresha Sitiye, gutegura, gufuza cyangwa gukomerera ikintu, gukomerera ibyo bisobanuro by'Sitiye, kandi gukomeza abategeye harimo guhoza ibyo mategeko.
Amakuru y'ibyo bisobanuro by'amafaranga

Ibyo bisobanuro by'ibidukiro bijyanwe mu bisobanuro gusa. Ikintu cyose kuri Sitiye **ntibyasobanukirwa** nka bisobanuro by'ibidukiro, igishwa cyangwa gufata subiki, cyangwa bisobanuro by'ibidukiro, imibare, ikorerezi, cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro. Ntabwo ndoze ku birema na Financial Conduct Authority (FCA). Nyuruyemo [ubwanjye bw'ibyo bisobanuro by'amafaranga](/disclosures) kugirango wiyoba wasobanukirwa.
Ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwubake

Keretse iyo bivugwa, ibyo bisobanuro byose kuri Sitiye, bikubiyemo ibyo bisobanuro, ifoto, ifoto, ibimenyetso, ibivugiro, n'ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwubake, ni byanjye kandi bikunzirwa n'ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwubake, ibimenyetso, n'ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwubake.

Wiyoba wamewe no kugera n'ibyo bisobanuro byanjye gusa kugirango wiyoba wakoze nk'ubwanjye. Ntacakora ikintu cyose, ntacagira amakuru, ntacagira ibyo bisobanuro, ntacakoresha ibyo bisobanuro mu nzira z'ubwubake, cyangwa kucinya ibimenyetso by'ubwubake cyangwa ibimenyetso by'ubwubake.
Ibyo bisobanuro kandi ibikorerezi

Niba ushira imvugo, ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwubake, cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro mu mahoro y'ibidukiro: wiyoba wakunzirwa ibyo bisobanuro, wiyoba wamewe nkigucyubaka ibyo bisobanuro kandi wiyoba wasobanukirwa, ntabwo ndoze kugucyubaka cyangwa gufata ibyo bisobanuro, ndibara ibyo bisobanuro by'abandi, kandi wiyoba wakunzirwa gukinga ibyo bisobanuro.
Ibimenyetso by'abandi

Sitiye ishobora kubamo ibimenyetso ku sitiye z'urundi munsi cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro. Ibyo bimenyetso bivugwa kugirango wiyoba wasubiza. Ntabwo ndoze ku birema by'ubyo bisobanuro, ibiciro, cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro by'ibyo bisobanuro byabandi.
Ikintu cy'ubwubake nta kiwigire

**SITIYE IJYANWE KU BISOBANURO N'UBWUBAKE BITACYUHO IKINTU CYOSE**, mucyo cyubwakikize cyangwa mucyo cyubwakikize, bikubiyemo ikintu cy'ubwubake, ikintu cy'ubwubake, ikintu cyose cy'ubwubake, cyangwa ubwambaro bwa ibyo bisobanuro cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro.
Ikintu cy'ibyo bisobanuro

**MU KIFARANGA KININI CYIHITAMO IBYO MATEGEKO, LORIMER JENKINS **NTIBYIZERE IBYO BISOBANURO BYOSE** ku muntu, ibyo bisobanuro, ikintu cy'ubwubake cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro, ibyo bisobanuro by'amafaranga, ibyo bisobanuro cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro, ibyo bisobanuro cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwubake cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro.
Ikintu cyose **gisobanura nta kindi kintu n'aho ku gifaranga utanze kugirango wiyoba wakomeza Sitiye (nitaraje zero).**
Kunakwiza

Wiyoba wakoze nk'amwe, wiyoba wagira n'ibyo bisobanuro, kandi wiyoba wakunzirwa Lorimer Jenkins ku bisobanuro byose, ibyo bisobanuro, ibyo bisobanuro, ibyo bisobanuro n'ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwanjye, guhoza ibyo mategeko, guhoza ibyo bisobanuro by'abandi, ibyo bisobanuro by'ibidukiro, cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro wayasize.
Amakuru y'ubwanjye
Gukoresha Sitiye kunzira nayo n'ibyo bisobanuro yanjye [Privacy Policy](/privacy), irikubaho mu ibyo mategeko.
Impinduka z'ibyo mategeko
Ndi hamwe n'uko ndibara ibyo mategeko icyumweru cyose. Impinduka zishobora gukora bivugwa mu kugera, kandi ubwanjye bwakomeza mu kugera kumutumuzi utategezebusha ibyo mategeko bivugwa kubitangaza.
Ibyo mategeko y'ubwongereza
Ibyo mategeko byanditswe n'ibigize by'ubwongereza. Ibyo bisobanuro byose bishobora gukora mu nzira z'ubwubake, kandi niba ntubigira, ubwongereza bw'ubwongereza bushobora gukora.
Ikintu cyose
Niba ikintu cyose cy'ibyo mategeko gitishwe nk'ikintu cyose cyangwa ntacagira nzira, ibyo mategeko byose bishobora gukoma.
Kurikiranya
Niba ufite ibibazo ku makuru yubwanjye, kurikirana nanjye kuri heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Mu kugera kuri Sitiye, wiyoba wagize ngo wasomye, wiyoba wasobanukirwa, kandi wiyoba wakoze nk'amwe n'ibyo mategeko y'ibikorerezi.
Ibambiro

Wote mu lorimerjenkins.com ("Sitiye"). Iri Privacy Policy risesama ko Lorimer Jenkins ("Njye," "moi," cyangwa "myanjye") ryabukira, ryakoresha, kandi ryakinga amakuru iyo mugera Sitiye yanjye mu kigero cyubwanjye.
Amakuru abukirwa
Amakuru abukira mu mahoro
Iyo mugera Sitiye, abukirwa amakuru mu mahoro kuva Google Analytics, birimo:

items: Amakuru yego n'igihe cyose mu kinyamakuru

content.content: Amakuru wayasize
Mu gihe cyino, Sitiye itabara amakuru y'ubwanjye byoroshye kuri abakoresha kuva mu buryo cyangwa amakonti, keretse ikintu kirimo:

**Amakuru y'amafaranga:** Niba ukurikiranya mu mahoro y'amafaranga kuva mu meji, ndibara n'ibyo bisobanuro wayasize, birimo izina ryacu, inyamaswa y'email, ibyo bisobanuro by'ikintu, imvugo, kandi ibyo bisobanuro byose wayasize.
Ibyo bisobanuro byakoresha

Nkoresha ibyo bisobanuro abukira kuva Google Analytics kugirango nkumenye ko tugera Sitiye iwacu, nkabona ikintu n'igihe cyose kigacyara, nkacyubaka amakuru n'ibyo bisobanuro byikiriro, kandi nkacyubaka ibyo bisobanuro by'Sitiye.
Nkoresha amakuru wayasize mu mahoro y'amafaranga kugirango nkemenye amafaranga y'ubwiyunge, nkubikira n'abagereka, kandi nkubika inzira z'ibyo bisobanuro by'amafaranga.
Google Analytics

Sitiye ikoresha Google Analytics, ibikorerezi by'ubwongereza bivugwa na Google LLC. Google Analytics ikoresha cookies kugirango ishobore gukumenya ko abakoresha bakoresha Sitiye. Kugirango wiyoba wasobanukirwa mu mahoro ya Google, nyuruyemo: [Google's Privacy Policy](https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites)
Gukuramo

Ushobora gukuramo Google Analytics mu kuyambika [Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout) cyangwa mu kuguhindura ibyo bisobanuro byacu kugirango wiyoba wakomeza cyangwa ukure cookies.
Cookies

Cookies ni ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwubake bivugwa mu kigero cyacu. Sitiye ikoresha cookies gusa kuva Google Analytics kugirango ishobore guhoza ibyo bisobanuro bivugwa hejuru. Ushobora gukuganya cookies kuva mu nzira z'ubwongereza byacu.
Ubwubake bw'amakuru

Amakuru ya Google Analytics kunzira mu myezi 26 kuva mu gihe cyabukira, kandi icyo gihe nyuma cyakazi kubwiyunge. Amakuru wayasize mu mahoro y'amafaranga kunzira igihe cyose cyikinini cyangwa igihe cyerekeza n'ibyo mategeko.
Ibikorerezi by'amafaranga
Niba ushira imvugo cyangwa ibyo bisobanuro by'ibidukiro:

items: Ndibikora n'abandi bacyo bikona mu nzira y'ubwubake
Ntibyakuramo cyangwa gushyira amakuru n'abandi kugirango nkubikira neza

content.content: Ibimenyetso by'abandi
Sitiye ishobora kubamo ibimenyetso ku sitiye z'urundi munsi. Ntabwo ndoze ku birema by'ubyo bisobanuro. Ndagushimira kubirebure ibimenyetso byayo.
Ubwanyu

Kuva ku kinini cyubwongereza, ubwanyu bushobora kubamo ubwanyu bukubiyemo ubwanyu bw'amakuru abukirwa, gusaba ukuramo k'amakuru yacu, nti kuri bisobanuro, kandi ubwanyu bw'ubwubake. Kugirango wiyoba wagushyira mu mahoro, kurikirana nanjye kuri heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Kuri abagera mu kigare cy'Ubwongereza (GDPR)

Niba ari mu kigare cy'Ubwongereza, ubwanyu bushobora kubamo ubwanyu bukubiyemo General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Ibyo bisobanuro by'ubwubake bw'amakuru ni ubwubake mu mahoro y'ibyo bisobanuro n'ibikorerezi, kandi kugirango wiyoba wasobanukirwa mu mahoro y'amafaranga, ubwubake mu mahoro y'ubwanyubukiriza.
Kuri abagera mu California (CCPA)
Niba ari umu California, ubwanyu bushobora kubamo ubwanyu bukubiyemo California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), bikubiyemo ubwanyu bw'amakuru abukirwa kandi ubwanyu bw'usaba ukuramo.
Amakuru y'abana
Sitiye ntavugwa ku bana bababa munsi y'imyaka 18. Nti ndibara amakuru y'abana bababa munsi y'imyaka 18. Niba ubizi ko nabukire akakira cyose, kurikirana nanjye kugirango guciwe.
Impinduka z'iri Privacy Policy
Ndibara iri Privacy Policy icyumweru cyose. Impinduka zose zishobora kugura mu kinyamakuru hamwe n'umwanya w'icyiciro "Last Updated".
Ubwubake
Nyambukiranya gukinga amakuru yacu, nta nyungu y'ubwubake by'ubwongereza itari 100% nziza. Ntabwo nkwigira ubwubake bw'amakuru avugwa cyangwa ikintu cyubwubake cyose kuri Sitiye.
Kurikiranya
Niba ufite ibibazo ku makuru yubwanjye, kurikirana nanjye kuri heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Mu kugera kuri Sitiye, wiyoba wagije amakuru abukirwa n'akoresha nk'uko bivugwa mu iri Privacy Policy.

ProjectsPage.title: Porogaramu
ProjectsPage.roleAstro: CEO kuva gukoranirwa, ningizane y'imbere hamwe n'ubwiyunge
ProjectsPage.walletyDescription: Urubuga rw'isesezi ry'ubwiyunge bwa [Polkadot](https://polkadot.com) no [Kusama](https://kusama.network/), rwabasabye gushingira abakoresha isesezi nyinshi yiza ku bagaciro babo nk'itarimo, ikoreshwa bwa buri gicurasi, gusohoza CSV n'amafaranga yishyurirwa mu nama y'imiyoboro. Nategetse ubugabo bubiri mu [Kusama DAO](https://dune.com/substrate/kusama-gov), nayibweza nuko nari ndashaka kuzira [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com/).
ProjectsPage.othentDescription: Ibyigisha by'[Othent](https://othent.io) nari nkw'uko kugira nubushakira online consumers kurangira blockchain projects, utarabigize kuri complex cryptographic private keys kandi gukora Oauth account access nka Google. Nabatije porogaramu nk'umuntu wa mbere wazavira incubated munsi [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), software development company yakozwe nkuburyo [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) mu [Arweave](https://arweave.org) ecosystem. [Othent](https://othent.io) nyuma yakahuziwe nkuburyo [Wander](https://wander.app) muburyo bwa core product, iya [Arweave](https://arweave.org) & [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) ecosystem Web3 wallet yari akuba abantu 50,000, agahinduka [Wander Connect](https://www.wander.app/connect).
ProjectsPage.liquidOpsDescription: Ikiremwa cy'imibare n'iguzuguzo yashizwe ku [AO](https://ao.arweave.net), ikifuza gufungura hejuru ya $400m y'agaciro k'ibimenyetso bya [Arweave](https://arweave.org). Nateguye igikorwa hamwe na [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer), nabaye ikipimo cy'igikorwa cyambuka mu [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), nawakaye inzira nyinshi z'abataka [waitlist](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1863863983498805473?s=20) ziyakagaragaye kugera ku $55m soft-commits y'igitekerezo hamwe n'inzira y'ubwiyunge z'ari mu muyoboro, [yashyizwe mbere](https://x.com/aoTheVentures/status/1813676139795374171?s=20) mu gihe cy'ubushakashatsi bwa [AO Ventures](https://www.aoventures.io) kandi nategetse [$325k pre-seed round](https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/revolutionizing-defi-how-lorimer-jenkins-marton-lederer-are-transforming-arweave-liquidops-1729945). Twambukye mainnet, tufite ubwiyunge bunini n'ubwiyunge biva mu bubiko bwa AO Chrome/IOS/Andriod [Wander](https://wander.app) ([icyo wiyobora hano](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ODxijaC0Dc)) no [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com) ([icyo wiyobora hano](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GeQ01-rBUPQ&t=11s)). Twakozeze kandi twagombye ubwiyunge bwetwa na ibikorwa [Spearbit](https://cantina.xyz/solutions/spearbit) no [Quantstamp](https://quantstamp.com/).
ProjectsPage.contentCreationDescription: Nzira video content ku buryo bwose bw'imirire y'ibisohoka. Njyifuza kugira ngo ari inzira nziza yo kubaka komunite yanjye ku muryango, nkwerekeza isi ibyo nkora kandi kwitegereza abantu bashya mu mahanga. Nasohotse na podcast yitwa [Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).
ProjectsPage.cryptoTeenDescription: [Crypto Teen](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins) ni TikTok channel y'ubwiyunge ikora kugira nkw'uko kugira Gen Z kuburyo crypto ni, kurira ibyigisha byambere kandi kumenya kwiyunga Web3 blockchain space.
ProjectsPage.subsidisejsDescription: Subsidise JS ni package yakozwe kugira nkw'uko [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) kugira bundle transactions hamwe kandi kubyakozwe gas fees kuburyo ibyakozwe transactions nkuburyo [ANS-102](https://github.com/ArweaveTeam/arweave-standards/blob/master/ans/ANS-102.md) Arweave network standard. Nabigire intergrate ibyo mu porogaramu zinshi yari ikora kugira nkw'uko gufatabuza users yabawo gas upload fees, nkw'ibyakozwe etabikoze abantu gukora AR tokens kugira nkw'uko gukora Web 2 consuer app yakozwe kuri Arweave.
ProjectsPage.astroDescription: Astro ni liquidity solution yakozwe kuburyo seamless integration muburyo bwa Web3 ecosystems. Nkuburyo guhuza multiple stablecoins kandi fiat currencies muburyo byose - USDA, Astro ikora kubasobanukirako frictionless value exchange kuburyo real-world kandi on-chain applications.
ProjectsPage.coolarweaveaddressDescription: Iyi repo ikora kubasobanukirako guhuza ibihumbi [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) kugira nkw'uko gushaka cool kandi unique wallet addresses. Claude akora nkw'ubwiyunge gushaka cool addresses kuburyo parameters yabyo.
ProjectsPage.aothecomputerDescription: Umuntu mwiyunge amsaga inzira y'ubwiyunge bw'agaciro kakenshi buguzi nzira nta kintu, namenyeka (kandi nkamvire icyo) kandi nitatangiraga kubirora ku mahoro akunze. Nonaha natangiye gushakisha Namecheap kugirango niba hari izindi mahoro akunze y'ibwiyunge. Birashikamo [AO The Computer .com](https://aothecomputer.com) yari iyo mutwa kugura kwa $11.48 buri mwaka, kitanga ico [redacted] üòú.
ProjectsPage.aohtmlDescription: AO HTML ni igikoresho kiguhanga gusegera mu nkoranyambago hamite ku mugongo w'HTML watanga ubwiyunge butura bushingira muruhuza rwa AO. Mureka ku nkoranyambago y'ubwiyunge hamite n'umuntu wiyunge nk'DAO, urugero nkoranyambago yandagatsinzirwa nyuma yo kwemeza imyigire y'DAO kandi Web2 zose ari mu Vercel/Netlify zandakoreshaho iki gikomeka.

WritingPage.substackSignup: Emeza kugira nkw'uko kubyakozwe blog posts kuburyo email.

BookshelfPage.title: Ishelf y'ibitabo
BookshelfPage.subtitle: Ibitabo byagusobanira imitekerereze yanjye
BookshelfPage.richDadPoorDadNotes: Inzira nziza ya financial literacy kandi ubwiyunge bw'assets hanze y'liabilities.
BookshelfPage.1984Notes: Iya chilling kandi prophetic dystopian novel yari igikomeye n'igihe cyose.
BookshelfPage.zeroToOneAuthorBio: Co-founder ya PayPal kandi Palantir Technologies
BookshelfPage.zeroToOneNotes: Ifite guide kuburyo entrepreneurs kugira nkw'uko kubaka monopolies kandi kubaka value nkuburyo questioning conventional wisdom kugira nkw'uko gushaka opportunities masha, challenge competition, kandi kubaka valuable companies.
BookshelfPage.hardThingNotes: Brutally honest advice kuburyo kubaka kandi gukora startup. Nta sugarcoating, gusa real experiences.
BookshelfPage.whatYouDoNotes: Fascinating exploration ya company culture nkuburyo historical examples kuburyo Toussaint Louverture kuri Genghis Khan.
BookshelfPage.spareNotes: Iya candid look muburyo royal life kandi pressures ya kubigira muburyo public eye nk'umuntu watize ibibazo.
BookshelfPage.riseAndFallNotes: Iya biography yatekereza inzira ya Prince Andrew kandi Sarah Ferguson, kuburyo marriage yabawo kuri present day.

News.news1Title: Devs Partnership kubwayo Arweave's First Lending Protocol Yashyizwe hamwe na AO

About.description: Ndi umukambane wava i England kandi nkurikira ubwiyunge mu mahoro ya AirBnb mu Amerika/Ubwongereza/EU. Ndikunarikiranisha ibituku, ibigo by'ibyishimo n'iterambere ry'ibikoresho. Ndi n'umuntu wari akazi mu mahanga y'amafaranga n'umukunzi w'umwuga. Ndi kandi ongera kwiyambaza imvugo kandi nandonze podcaste yitwa [Lorimer's Podcast](/#podcast).
About.mumQuote: "Umuntu wacu wakorera neza mu bijyanye n'ubwenegihugu"

Podcast.title: Lorimer's Podcast
Podcast.description: Injira nabitabiranya binshi hamwe nabakora inzira, abayobozi b'amafaranga, n'abakora ibinyabuzima mu mahoro y'ibikorwa bya startup. Nzikora umwanya w'ibibazo byinzira z'ayo, amasomo yabigiye, n'ejo hazaza rya teknoloji itandukanye.

SubstackSignup.title: Mwazi neza
SubstackSignup.description: Injira mu mahitamo yanjye kugirango ubone inzira nshya z'inyandiko zerekana mu poste yawe. Nandika ku bijyanye na startup, crypto, kubaka mu ruhanga no kuvunda kwanjye nkaho mwamuzi.

FAQ.title: Vos Vuba Cyane
FAQ.a1: Ndi muanziliza nzira nikuri LiquidOps, inzira y'ikiruhuko n'ikarushanwa kuri AO. Nifashisha no kugura inzira y'indangamirwa z'iterambere ry'ibambari kandi nandika ibigezweho ku bankuruka, crypto, n'ubwenge bw'ibikorwa mu nyir'umwimerere.
FAQ.q2: Hari ubwoba nkuko ukora gukora no kwiga?
FAQ.a2: Sibikora ibiganiro nubwo niyiyumva ko ibiganiro bikunze kutariruta inyungu. Nifite ikinini cyamakomoza mu muanziliza wifuza gukora hamwe nayo mu nzira itazira.
FAQ.q3: Niyindimiriza ute kugira ngo nkugire amafaranga?
FAQ.a3: Natumire ibimenyetso ku [heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) hamwe n'igipimo cy'amafaranga yacu. Nkora gutanga $500-$5,000 mu bikorwa by'ibambari bitangira kugira ngo byagunga mu nzira nfite ubwenge.
FAQ.a4: Gikunze gukora na TypeScript, React, Next.js, n'ibitekhnoloji by'blockchain harimo Arweave na AO. Ndi mubare w'ubwenge bwanjye.
FAQ.q5: Njye nshobora kuba ishami ku mahoro yacu?
FAQ.a5: Nkeneye kuvuga n'ibiganiro bitera neza, abagira amafaranga, n'ababwira. Tuma ibimenyetso ku [heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com](mailto:heylorimerjenkins@gmail.com) hamwe n'ibigezweho ku bwiyunge n'ikibazo kugirango tuvuge.

FilmsPage.title: Filime & TV
FilmsPage.subtitle: Igitabo cyanjye cyo gusuzuma filime no TV
FilmsPage.marginCallDescription: Filime yitambike mu masaha 24 mu banki y'isoko y'imibare mu Wall Street iyica hanze y'icyica cya 2008.
FilmsPage.theBigShortDescription: Ibigishushanyo byijambo byacu bitangaza igitabo cya ukuri cyabashakaga no gukorera imbere muri 2008 ibyuma.
FilmsPage.theWolfOfWallStreetDescription: Ibigishushanyo byukuri byagaciro byajordan belfort, umwanzi w'amasoko yashakatije abagire ifaranga munini.
FilmsPage.billionsDescription: Filime icyiza cyane yicyica cyamafaranga akira munyarwanda muri mibare n'abashaka kweguriza.
FilmsPage.goldDescription: Bikozwe ku buntu bwukuri, umuntu yishaka inarusuye runani mu mahoro y'Indonesiya.
FilmsPage.warDogsDescription: Abagabo babiri bakarutsa imibare yigihugu kwiyata ibyuma nyinshi mu isi.
FilmsPage.uncutGemsDescription: Umuntu wibihumbi akoza ibyuma bya ndoto mu izindi nzira.
FilmsPage.catchMeIfYouCanDescription: Igitabo cya ukuri cy'umuntu yacaye iminyezi n'ibihe byambogo.
FilmsPage.pulpFictionDescription: Ibigishushanyo byabagizi n'ubuzima mu Los Angeles.
FilmsPage.inglouriousBasterdsDescription: Itsinda rya soldata risuzuma iterabwoba ry'abarundi.
FilmsPage.riseOfTheFootsoldierDescription: Ibigishushanyo byabantu bava mu mibano y'amasoko.
FilmsPage.topBoyDescription: Filime ya Netflix icyacu kugaruka mu mibare.
FilmsPage.lockStockAndTwoSmokingBarrelsDescription: Abana bane ba London bashaka ifaranga.
FilmsPage.interstellarDescription: Abashakisha bashaka isi nshya mu mahoro.
FilmsPage.exMachinaDescription: Umwanzi w'abandi yigera ku nzira nshya.
FilmsPage.getOutDescription: Umuntu w'ubwavu yata kwa muryango w'ubwenzi.
FilmsPage.prisonersDescription: Abagore basigaye bamwe n'umuntu akagira ikigega.
FilmsPage.glassOnionAKnivesOutMysteryDescription: Umuntu yishaka gusuzuma icyiteguro cya telefone.
FilmsPage.thePursuitOfHappynessDescription: Igitabo cya ukuri cy'umuntu yishaka ubwenge.
FilmsPage.theBoyInTheStripedPyjamasDescription: Ubwiye bwa bana babiri mu cyaka.
FilmsPage.tigerKingDescription: Igitabo cya ukuri cy'umuntu yishaka inyani.
